Reviews.Author: netflyer
Reviews.Content: I went to pick up my daughter who was working at Disney World and thought I would try something different this time since we were just there a few months before and stayed at the Marriott Cypress Harbor, (which by the way is wonderful). I was a little leary but the price was right. We got there after 11PM and went to check in. We got our keys and had to drive way in the back. For some reason we were put way in the back, the place was not full so I don't know why. But I figured no problem it should be quiet and I could get some work done. We unloaded the car, took our bags upstairs only to find out our keys did not work. So we loaded everything back into the car and headed back to the front desk. The gentleman apologized, gave us new keys and said if there is a problem just call this number and we will come out there. Okay, sounds good, head back to the room and once again keys don't work. So I thought I will call the number I was given, but there was no answer!! Once again headed back. Once we were finally in the room I was just disgusted at the cleanliness or should I say lack there of!! There was a pack of cigarettes in the bedroom dresser drawer and the sheets on the beds were not changed!! It was disgusting. There was no way we were sleeping in that filth. So we headed back to the front desk for the third time and I demanded to get my room changed. By the timethis was all said and done it was well after midnight. We stayed here for 3 nights too many. Our second room was still not "clean", the pool area was also disgusting and I couldn't even sit in the sun. There seemed to be a grimy film in the pool, just plain gross. The staff here is not even friendly, except for the gentleman at the front desk. No one bothers to say hello to you and they just give you a look like they aren't very happy at their job. So please beware, prices sound good but yes it is too good to be true.

Reviews.Title: “Don't waste your money! Very unfriendly staff and problems with the room.”
Reviews.Author: jojo_noble
Reviews.Content: The condo looks great when you first enter. But little things are lacking. Don't try to move any furniture, the legs are not sturdy on the coffee table/end tables. Instead of staff properly fixing the legs, they just try to screw them in haphazardly. The window blinds didn't work and something was broken on them. There were a few other issues, none were just terrible. However, the terrible part comes when you check out and leave and then get a call from the Manager stating they have already charged $500 extra to your personal credit card for these problems in the room that were already there upon check-in. So my advice to future guests is to #1 Take pics of any issues in your room first thing. #2 Write down any and all issues/problems you find in your room. #3 Turn those all in to Mgmt before you stay and see if they have another room that is better. Don't get stuck paying out the wazoo like we did. It ruins your entire Orlando trip!!

Reviews.Title: “What a great condo!”
Reviews.Author: 33773Sharoninfla
Reviews.Content: We've stayed overnight many times out near Orlando in the last 30 years, but this resort has to have been the best by far. The condo itself was even better than it looked on the Internet. It was very spacious, clean, and comfortable. We loved it and will stay there again. If you are reading this and thinking about renting one of these condos, remember that it's not a hotel room. Bring toilet paper, soap, and shampoo and you'll have a perfect place to lodge.

Reviews.Title: “This was one of the best vacations i've had!”
Reviews.Author: shortstackmilwaukee
Reviews.Content: Mike Ditka resorts was phenominal, our room was awesome, huge, clean, just very pleasant and bright. The grounds were kept imaculant. The staff was helpful when i had questions. I'm definelty coming back and i've already recommended other friends and family to also take a vaction at this resort. Thanks again for the wonderful hospitality! Stephanie

Reviews.Title: “Canceled me at noon on the day I was to check in”
Reviews.Author: Grenaldo
Reviews.Content: They left a message at noon on the day I was to check in saying they were booked and the room I had reserved was unrentable. I called the lady back but she was unavailable but I was promised a call within a half hour. An hour later no call so I called back and this time was promised a call back within 5 minutes. Half hour later still no call so I called and finally got in touch. She offered to relocate me with an upgrade but we were staying with several friends so this wasn't an option. I ended up just asking for a refund since they weren't willing to make up for all the inconvenience.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible!”
Reviews.Author: xx2rican4uxx
Reviews.Content: I reserved a room a month in advance and had confirmation emails and everything. When I arrived on my date, they had cancelled my room and NEVER informed me! I just drove from Miami with a 3yr old and 8months pregnant. And they were completely booked due to it being memorial wkend.thank goodness another hotel was able to accommodate me for the rest of the wkend. No management was available to speak with and to top it off I'm a veteran just trying to have a enjoyable memorial wkend! Never again with this place.

Reviews.Title: “a lovely place, super clean, very well maintained and managed”
Reviews.Author: scheffen
Reviews.Content: We were here last year and booked again for this year and I was surprised the place is same level of cleanliness is super well maintained same as last year, I was afraid that the level would go down. No it was just perfect. My husband and myself we feel, when we arrive there, we are at home, we feel very comfortable. We tayed 6 nights, then went to Miami for 3 nights and came back for another 5 nights, once we entered the door of our house we felt Back at home :o) Thank you for this, we will definately come back again next yer and will stay longer.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our Stay”
Reviews.Author: pepper180
Reviews.Content: This was the second time we stayed here and we were all very happy with everything. We were in town only for one night but still wanted to enjoy 2 bedrooms, a larger space to relax in, close to lots of shopping, restaurants, parks, etc. and our room definately provided that--it was neat and clean as well. Check in is 4 and our room was ready by 3:30 - we were able to lounge at the pool and spa and enjoy a relaxing and delicious drink from the tiki bar served by a very friendly bartender. Check in and out was quick and easy and the staff all very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “This property could be nice, but is simply unkept.”
Reviews.Author: 954DBN
Reviews.Content: The good: - We rented a two bedroom, two bath unit with a kitchen and w/d. - It was spacious and conveniently located to the attractions, restaurants, etc. - The pool area and gym were nice. The bad: - The front desk clerks were not overly friendly or helpful. - Check-in is at 4 pm, and our unit wasn't available until the last minute. - It was entirely unkept and filthy. - When we walked in, there were at least 7 spiders in the unit. - The window sills were covered in dust. - The carpets clearly weren't vacuumed, although they left a vacuum in the unit in case you want to do so yourself on your vacation. - The faucet in the kitchen sink was broken. - The toilet in the master wasn't flushing properly (called twice before they came to fix it). - The beds are old, and somewhat uncomfortable, and the twin bed had only a fitted sheet and a blanket.

Reviews.Title: “You ruined my transportation schedule out of pocket expenses.”
Reviews.Author: mosacto21
Reviews.Content: I was very excited to stay at a hotel with a kitchenette great we had a fully equipped room. The thing that gets me a dirty restroom needed to be clean. hidden fees like u wouldn't believe resort fees and taxes. Booked the room through expedia pay taxes & payed taxes again at the resort. You have to pay for room services. One major thing was transportation only 3 pick ups & 3 drop offs only to Epcot. What if I don't want to go to Epcot the first day well u had to get 2 types of transportation to where u want to go waist of time aahhh!!! If u don't make it back 2 your hotel u are screwed TAXI. We waisted a lot of time & energy up paying 2 times parking which is $14 per day just so I wont waist my time waiting for couple of busses. I would kind of recommend but you never with the services like other people had reviewed on this web site. The rooms are spacious but we did need trash bags, dish soap sponge to do the dishes.

Reviews.Title: “My Family Reunion at Mike Ditka Runaway Beach Club”
Reviews.Author: babebarb
Reviews.Content: We just recently had our family reunion at Mike Ditka Runaway Beach Club and my family had a ball we enjoyed ourselves so much that we wished we could have stayed a little longer but some of my family members are planning to come back in july for another vacation the staff was very friendly and i would like to especially thank Sina - for helping me book our rooms.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT PLACE TO STAY WITH SCHOOL GROUPS”
Reviews.Author: DirectorJimmy
Reviews.Content: First of all, I would like to say that this was a beautiful resort. I took a group of Middle School students to the resort for four nights. The staff were so friendly, and helpful also. The evening staff took the time to look up resteraunt deals and phone numbers so that we could get the best value for our money with regard to group meals. There was a walmart within walking distance, and many different eating establishments, as well as shops for different things. The resort was very clean, and really beautiful. There were two pools, a hot tub, and athletic facilities. The gated community ensured safety, and the other patrons and residents fo the resort were very nice. The rooms were apartments, and each was well equiped to make our stay very comfortable. Each apartment had pull out couches, tvs in every room, washer and dryer, fully equped kitchens, and restocking for whatever you needed. The one thing that I learned was that since it was a resort, you need to ask for extra room supplies and towels during the day as there was noone to supply them in late evening, but this was communicated by the staff, and even when I ran out of tissue paper, the staff were very accomodating. This was a very student appropriate resort area. I felt very comfortable taking my students there, and with the apartment setup, was able to have a chaperone in one bedroom of each apartment. This was a great help and comfort in knowing that the adults were very close, yet had all the privacy they needed. I would recommend this resort to any school group, adult group, or family. It is worth the money, and the experience will be worthwhile and rewarding. The last thing to say is that it is very close to Disney and Old Towne kissimmee. If you want convenience, then please give this resort a chance. Sincerely, Jimmy Buchanan Director of Choral Activities Eastern Guilford Middle School Guilford County Schools

Reviews.Title: “Terrible customer service, bad towels, and dirty sheets.”
Reviews.Author: Ewl29
Reviews.Content: We made reservations for a two bedroom and upon checkin, was told we had to all fit into a one bedroom. They gave us the option for a one bedroom on property or a two bedroom 9 miles away, which would completely defeat the purpose of our entire group staying in the same place.When calling the next day to move to a two bedroom, customer service was terrible, staff had lots of attitude. We requested towels and more shampoo and conditioner since we had numerous people in our one bedroom, and we NEVER received anything! The sheets were very dirty. Staff was extremely unhelpful and we would never come back to 'resort'.

Reviews.Title: “Just like Home”
Reviews.Author: twsjunk
Reviews.Content: We loved it. We had a two bedroom with a king size bed in one and a full and twin in the other. It was clean and spacious. It was just like staying at home. It was great having a normal home heating and cooling system instead of having the traditional hotel air conditioning that keeps you up at night kicking on and off all night with a loud roar. We even had a full kitchen and washer and dryer. The price was great at about $103/night after the resort fee was added.

Reviews.Title: “Decent place, needs to excel at the basics and fix-up minor issues”
Reviews.Author: jcrusselljr
Reviews.Content: Recommended by a friend. Place is safe, clean, and conviently located to Orlando attractions. Could really benefit from providing better basics....missing simple things like paper towels, napkins, trash bags, laundry detergent, etc from the fully furnished rooms. Lots of little stuff broken or in disrepair...dining room table legs ready to fall off, light bulbs burned out, tv remote missing. A couple bucks investment, a good handyman, and paying close attention to the basics and they can be excellent. I'll look for other places to stay next visit to Orlando....nice enough place, but didn't win me as a customer for life.

Reviews.Title: “Saved me money which I spent at WDW!”
Reviews.Author: slider710
Reviews.Content: For the price, this place is wonderful. 8 of us stayed there and we had plenty of room. We went through vrbo. Com and got everything as promised. Room was clean, staff friendly, pool awesome, nightly movies at the pool. My kids fed the ducks and played soccer and tennis in the parking lot. Huge fun. Walmart is like 1/4 mile away and yes we shopped there . Our kitchen had everything, so if we needed more stuff, it was only walking distance. My margaritas were awesome. This resort was clean, friendly, and well maintained. Either my standards are low or some of the negative complaints are because people like to complain. WDW got my money as expected, but I saved a bundle by staying at a wonderful resort .

Reviews.Title: “FABULOUS!!!”
Reviews.Author: jjgrn
Reviews.Content: I stayed here with some friends for a week. From the very beginning of our stay to the very last day, we had an amazing time! Everyone, from the front desk to housekeeping, was very accomodating and friendly! The pool and tiki bar was definately a highlight! It was so relaxing with refreshing drinks and a very personable bartender! The location of the resort was ideal, close to attractions, shops and restaurants. I will recommend this resort to anyone needing a place to stay in the area and I will definately be returning!!!

Reviews.Title: “We will never stay here again!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Debbiebear51
Reviews.Content: We have.stayed at this resort for the past two years. Enjoyed it very much. This year, SOMETHING changed. Furniture was damaged, burn marks knobs missing from coffee table (screws exposed). Toilet never worked right, hardly any towels. Had to constantly ask for toilet paper and towels, we were promised housekeeping on 4th day of our 13-day stay, they NEVER came. No DVD player in room, although listed in amenities. EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED!!! I tried to send a comment card to the corporate office to complain, but it was returned to sender...unable to forward! Also noticed that some of the condos were listed in a real estate catalog as being FOR SALE. Something just does not seem right. Do not under any circumstances stay at this place....we NEVER will again....you have lost a long time customer!!!

Reviews.Title: “Our new home away from home.”
Reviews.Author: Ladybug430
Reviews.Content: It was our first time at your hotel and we truly enjoyed our stay. We were very impressed and will definetely come back often as we are frenquent visitors of Disney World and now prefer to stay at Runaway Beach. Our grandson loved the kiddy pool and so did we. The rooms are very spacious and very clean. Excellent location to our favorite destination.

Reviews.Title: “wonderful time, great accomodations”
Reviews.Author: triptime_11
Reviews.Content: My son (10) and I stayed at Runaway Beach for a week in mid-March, and we were very pleasantly surprised. Our condominium was large, very clean, felt new, had lofted ceilings with a game room in a loft area upstairs, two flat screen TV's, and was equipped with a well-designed full kitchen and all necessary cooking equipment. The bed linens and towels were clean, and the bed firm and seemed new. Everything worked well, and we had an easy and relaxing stay in very comfortable surroundings. At around $100 per day, the cost was less than a standard hotel room We reserved a month ahead of our trip during Spring break, and when we arrived were told that the resort was completely booked and all condos had been rented, yet we were upgraded for free to a larger one-bedroom unit with more room for unexplained reasons. Go figure. As for the public areas of the resort, most condos including ours are placed around a small lake, and the grounds are well kept and in good shape. The two pools and hot-tub are the center for interaction with other guests, and we met several friendly guests and friendly kids at the pool area. We had no security/safety issues at all, no cleanliness issues, WiFi worked well every day, we used a new and large public gas barbeque grill, and the staff were friendly, helpful and polite, in particular Jennifer. Shuttle buses ran daily to Disneyworld, if that is your thing, and food and a few restaurants are available with a 5 minute walk to a nearby WalMart and other shops. All in all, I was wondering how staying here would work out after seeing a few negative reviews on this site, but our stay at Runaway was a real highlight of our trip.

Reviews.Title: “Lots of value, modest disrepair, clean.”
Reviews.Author: HowDue
Reviews.Content: Large and inexpensive for a 2 bedroom with full kitchen. The rooms were clean but there were a number of items in mild disrepair. The toilet leaked ( Looked new and incorrectly put together). One of the TVs had no cable cord and the phone had no cord to the wall. Was missing a remote for the tv. The refrigerator wouldn't cool, the freezer wouldn't freeze. The sofa bed was in disrepair, missing some of the supports. I put some cups under the leaky toilet, used ice to cool our food and put the sofa bed mattress on the floor, used our cell phone, and all was okay. A lot of room for a great price, in need of a decent handyman. Seems to have been maintained by someone who wasn't too proficient. We got a downstairs unit, but suffered from a kid running back and forth upstairs half the night. Can't blame the resort for the lack of discipline. All in all, you get about what you pay for, more or less. Would recommend with the caveats appropriate to the above. It's large, full kitchen, two bathrooms, and if you check multiple sites, a pretty good price. Upscale camping for sure.

Reviews.Title: “I would not recommend this to my worst enemy.”
Reviews.Author: coley61
Reviews.Content: This is the far worst selection I have ever made for a family vacation. First of all housekeeping sucks, I thought there job was to ensure that the room is clean from top to bottom before releasing it for rental. Never enough of toilet paper,garbage bags. They should all ways make sure that the kitchen is fully equip for families to prepare meals. with a set of pots, dish detergent, papertowels,dish clothes. It makes no since what so ever to constantly call the front desk for every thing. This was a trip to hell and back.

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable stay, enjoyed the large space. Would definitely stay again.”
Reviews.Author: KT5Dalls_GA
Reviews.Content: We were down moving our son to Orlando for motorcycle school and found the Mike Ditka Resort on line and decided it looked like a nice place to stay. We really enjoyed the large rooms and kitchen area that we had. The kids were able to sleep in separate beds in a separate room which was nice. It was conveniently located to the disney locations. The service at check in was really good. They were very nice and professional. We are planning a family vacation down there this summer and are planning to try and stay here again. My only recommendation would be a spot to park vehicles that might be pulling trailers. There was not a good spot for that. But we managed and had no complaints.

Reviews.Title: “It feels like a home away from home.”
Reviews.Author: c18ap
Reviews.Content: The rooms are very spacious and comfortable- perfect for a short trip or an extended stay. The location is convenient. The area is quiet and ideal for relaxation. We would definitely stay again, in fact, we have stayed at least 3 or 4 times before.

Reviews.Title: “Resort is beautiful; service has declined”
Reviews.Author: slickgracie
Reviews.Content: It's a beautiful resort w/nice rooms and large kitchen and an excellent location. Nice pools and hot tub. We've stayed here before and were very pleased. The service has gone downhill which is a shame. Hope they get their act together soon.

Reviews.Title: “nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Carol T
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here several times over the last 3 years and have always found the resort and people working there very nice will be visiting again 3-16 until 3-18-2011 I will report again if the resort is still as nice as it was the last time we visited

Reviews.Title: “Mike Ditka's Beach Resort...Let us Ruin your stay in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: Amunda
Reviews.Content: Dirty rooms, horrible staff. Lack of sheets for the beds, no wash clothes, coffee was in coffee maker when we got to room. 6 people staying in 3 bedroom villa and 2 rolls of toilet paper provided, asked housekeeping for more and was told "no, and if they had any, they wouldn't bring it down". There were also no spoons, had to eat cereal with a fork!

Reviews.Title: “It will literally make you want to RUN A WAY"”
Reviews.Author: arlenie35
Reviews.Content: This is the worst hotel I have ever stayed at. Let's begin this horror story by stating that upon check in we were told our room was not ready and had to wait; not a big deal, EXCEPT when entered our room we found another guest's belongings (i.e. laptop, cooler, etc). Apparently, they had given us a room that was being utilized by another guest. We could have easily stolen this person's belongings. The girl at the front desk did not find this to be a big deal, she actually proceeded to inform us that "they are very disorganized" and that if "upon entering our new room we find anything else to please call her." I guess this happens all the time at this place. Upon getting our new room, we had no toilet paper and all our towels were wet, used, and dirty. We called the front desk and were told someone would bring us new towels and toilet paper. When this person didn't arrive we decided to head to the front desk, where we were told we had been put on a waiting list for toilet paper and towels. I informed the very rude front desk clerk that I needed to utilize the restroom and she proceeded to tell me I just had to hold it. The towels and toilet paper did arrive (hours later, after we had used the restroom at a nearby restaurant and attended dinner WITOUT showering after a day at the parks). In addition, our shower curtains were full of hair and mold, and the place is visibly dirty. We were able to speak to the manager on the following day, who gave us a gift card to be used in the future for a free night stay. I guess if I choose to relive this nightmare I will be taking my own towels, toilet paper, shower curtain, cleaning supplies, etc. Overall, Mike Ditka's Runaway Beach Resort will literally make you want to run a way. Don't be fooled by the way it looks on the outside.

Reviews.Title: “The worst stay ever...”
Reviews.Author: ddstone78
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at this resort,and let's just say I would never return or suggest it to anyone who want to have a great vacation...upon arrival,my room was not. Ready for check in which is at 4pm..which sucks being you have to pay a full rate that day. The clerk at the front desks was extremely rude,and tried to verbally fight with me,the villa was a good size but the fridge was broke,no toilet paper,they don't pick up your trash,my air was broke,which ran all night causing some of my guest to have sore throats the duration of their trip...They advertise poolside cabana,which never opened,nightly movies for the kids,which never happened..I planned on staying for a week,but after this experience,I decided I rather go home...please don't stay here,orlando has great places to stay..don't waste your time..they acted as like they were doing me a favor.

Reviews.Title: “Just what we were looking for”
Reviews.Author: jwillstp
Reviews.Content: Booked our reservation thru Mike Ditka resorts. Had to pay 100% at time of booking, which was a little annoying at the time, but it was nice not to have to pay upon checkout. This is a vacation rental, not a hotel. The room is not serviced every day. We knew this and had no problems.We booked a large one-bedroom but when we arrived we had been upgraded to a two bedroom. The room had recently been flooded and repairs had just been completed. We were the first ones to stay in the room after the repairs. Everything was clean and orderly. You could still smell the paint but that did not bother us. There were a number of items missing from the kitchen, but we called right after check in and someone came over and brought us everything we asked for. This was at 9pm. The living area and bedrooms were spacious, MUCH more room than a hotel. Room cleaning is available for an additional charge if you desire that. We were in town for a soccer tournament at Disney, so it was wonderful to have a washer and dryer in the room to wash uniforms every night.. Just plan ahead and bring laundry and kitchen supplies if you plan to use those parts of the room. We cooked breakfast twice while we were there. Using the OSceola parkway (with a 75 cent toll) you are on Disney property in less than 5 minutes. My only complaint about the room was that I did not sleep well. There was no noise but the bed was a little uncomfortable. I am used to that in a hotel. The real problem for me was all of the "street lights" outside of the bedroom (which was wonderful and safe outside at night). The windows only had blinds on them, no curtains. It was like daytime in the room all night long. Hanging room darkening blinds in the bedrooms would be a huge improvement. The kids loved the pool. There is a grill at the pool but we did not use it. The first night we were at the pool the Tiki bar was closed, apparently the bartender did not show up for work. The second night, it was open. A had a margarita, which had to be close to the worst margarita I have ever had. I would recommend bringing your own beverages. And don't forget to bring your own pool towels, they are not provided. Last piece of advice, Flippers pizza was fabulous. Have it delivered. Don't try to pick it up like we did. It was in the middle of the madness at Old Town and we got stuck in traffic forever. Avoid the Old Town area at night.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Resort but shoddy room”
Reviews.Author: askmey
Reviews.Content: The resort itself was attractive and in good location for our purposes at a reasonable price. Our one bedroom villa was good size for our needs. I've seen better sofas that were giveaways at the curb. Lights were burned out. Safety latch on door had long been broken. There were two dust pans but no broom. Vacuum attachments, but no vacuum. Appliances were newer and worked well. Kitchen had needed utensils but only one teaspoon. It just seemed that attending to the little things could have made a much better impression on a first time guest.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprised!!”
Reviews.Author: DallasJT
Reviews.Content: My wife and I found this resort via Trip Advisor and were a bit skeptical after reading the reviews but booked the room anyway.We were blow away once we got to the resort! A 2 bedroom condo for under $200 bucks a night! We are 2 families so we split the cost.There's an indoor air conditioned basketball court right off the lobby , a Tiki Bar at the pool with good drinks that are actually affordable!! The room was great , our room was clean and had a view of the lake. The staff was very nice. This was our first visit but we will be back in May and will be staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Very affordable, clean, and convenient”
Reviews.Author: danandmich
Reviews.Content: This resort offers a great value, nice rooms and great location for the orlando resort area. Have stayed on 4 separate occasions and will again.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place for visiting Orlando, your own supplies required...”
Reviews.Author: WNYVacationer
Reviews.Content: Recently, our family decided to take a Winter vacation in Orlando and chose to stay at Mike Ditka's Runaway Resorts. This was our choice because it fit perfectly with our budget and plans, to visit several Orlando attractions with our young children and to enjoy the benefits of a condominium in a safe and quiet location. The resort is within close proximity of Medieval Knights, Walt Disney World, Arabian Nights, Wonder Works, Universal Studios and much more. On top of all that, the resort has exactly what our family enjoys, heated pools for all ages with access to a pool bar, a fitness room with aerobic equipment and free weights, a basketball court, complimentary wireless internet and excellent rooms to stay. Since we read about the resort prior to our stay, we knew we would have to shop for our groceries and some necessities, and it was a fun, short trip to Wal-Mart and Target and we had everything we needed. Our room was clean and well equipped with a washer and dryer, comfortable beds, dishwasher, towels, blankets and pillows, two televisions with cable and a dvd player. Staff was very responsive and friendly to several requests that were made. The whole resort is gated with video surveillance and swipe card access. The entire landscape is manicured nicely and well maintained. In sum, it was an ideal place to spend a terrific Winter vacation! We would recommend this resort to our friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “Run for dear life”
Reviews.Author: CB2011
Reviews.Content: This is the worst hotel I have ever stayed at in my life the carpet were dirty the bathrooms were filthy The shower didn't drain properly. There were no pots,dish towel,dish liquid soap,spoons,toilet paper,shampoo or conditioner in the room. When staying there just bring everything from home. They don't have any was cloth,towels pillows,blankets we had one was cloth for 7 people are you really serious ? Phone and the blow dryer didn't work we called for someone to fix it but no one came. Called the next day and was promised that it would be done today still no one came. Whoever runs this hole in the wall should be a shamed of themselves poor Mike Ditka bet he doesn't know what his named is attached too. I tried for days to get a hold of Sina the manager and she was never in her office never returned my phone call when was there she wouldn't even come out her office she leavers her staff to deal with the brunt of the problems, Katie and Tisha was really helpful and were the only ones who showed some care in the world. call what kind of place don't have a manager on duty. If your thinking of saying here please think again and stay else where. This is a Warning Please find some where else to go I don't want you to ruin your family trip like how ours was ruined. btw my kids cried while staying there that;s how sad they were.

Reviews.Title: “This place is a joke. Ditka Should be Ashamed”
Reviews.Author: TheRockSays69
Reviews.Content: This has got to be one of the worst service oriented hotels/villas I have ever stayed at. We actually had booked a prior hotel before finding this hotel on the internet. Looked great and had nice price, so we re-booked and came her. Worst decision. Upon arrival there were dirty towels and nasty smoke pail with butts in it sitting on the front entance way. We went in and sofas were stained and there was a dirty stench. Both bathrooms were dirty and were barely cleaned. Both tubs had caulk pulling off tub and were black. Lastly we had 9 towels and one wash cloth. One roll of toilet paper and tv remotes failed to work. Called front desk and they said they would bring items down. 2 days later and still no supplies.. Went to Walmart and purchased ourselves. Stay on top floor, because you hear everything upstairs if on the bottom floor. Maid service leaves front door propped open for light and I mean light cleaning. Room was left open by housekeeping for at least the half hour I waited for them to come back. Housekeepers were seen smoking and leaning quiet a bit throughout the property. Issues were adrressed to a rude housekeeping manager, and when we contacted corporate individuals, they were less help than the pan handlers on I-4. Rude and disrespectful, and tried to give us the same discount they give returning guests, for our crappy stay. Lastly our vehicle was severely damaged on their property and there was absolutely no concern. I wouldn't stay here if I was ofered a free stay, and we come to Orlando once a year. Please do yourselves a favor and stay somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “The worst place I've ever stayed...and we travel ALOT!!!”
Reviews.Author: jj7231980
Reviews.Content: dirty towels sitting outside our door and ash tray full (we are non smokers) when we first arrived. Mold around bath tub. Hair and dirt on bathroom floor. Trim around bathroom sink was just laying on the counter. 9 towels and 1 wash cloth. Was told they didnt have anymore so we had to go to walmart to buy some. half a roll of toilet paper for our 9 day stay, was told they dont replenish. Again had to go to walmart. carpets are dirty and smelly. Walls are paper thin you can here the conversations of the people above/next to you. you have to wear a paper wrist band the entire time you are there to use their pool, if you lose it you have to pay $5 for a new one!!!!! housekeeping leaves your door propped open when they arent in there!!!!!!!! our car was damaged in their parking lot!!!! HORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE! Dont ask to speak to a manager because there is never one "available"! and dont complain about anything because all you will get is "we'll look into it." We visit Orlando almost every year and this was the worst experience ever! Do yourself a favor and pay a little extra to stay somewhere else!

Reviews.Title: “CAMPING AT A RESORT”
Reviews.Author: longwinter43
Reviews.Content: Our third trip in the past three years to the Mike Ditka Runaway Beach Club. There is a reason a "Under New Management" banner is NOT streaming over their entry way. In the past, little essentials (e.g. toilet paper) has been provided for the asking by a friendly staff. Not this year! Their cover letter states "certain items are no longer provided" during the course of your stay, they just forgot to list which items you needed to pick up at Target (Wal-Mart is very, very scary!). The staff was less than helpful, they could not make change, empty the full bucket of cigarette butts that greeted us on our arrival, fix our air conditioner to cool the room below 69F or clear the now defunct pool towel container. All guest must wear a paper wrist band to use the pool (yes, paper!). Hard to beat the price ($83.50 including resort tax), beware of the rooms facing the street, way too noisy for a good night's sleep. This is the last time we will stay here, we are looking for a friendly, fun place to spend our annual vacation. Two weeks is too long to rough it unless you are sleeping in a tent!

Reviews.Title: “Horrible Staff”
Reviews.Author: dee65_10
Reviews.Content: We had business there and stayed at the resort[ which was beautiful and clean] and the price was great but when we went to check-out,that was when the problems began.They put pails with sand on the porch for smokers and that way there is no smoking in the rooms[ which we don't smoke in our own home] so that was great but when we were checking out we were told that we would be charged $269.00 for smoking in our rooms.I was stunned because we never smoked in our rooms and I tried to explain that but there was a young girl at the front desk with a nasty attitude and she simply told me that we did smoke in the rooms and she was calling police and they will go check to see if we did or not.So while we were waiting the manager came out and told us that we have not paid for our stay yet so we need to do that also.I explained that we paid in full when we first checked in and so the manager told us she would have to check on that because she didn't see where we had so she leaves and then comes back and tells us,yes I see where you did pay.now by this time I am truely outraged because I was basically called a liar and kept in the lobby for 45 minutes trying to check out and then she tells me we won't be charged for smoking in the rooms.The young girl at the front desk had such a nasty attitude that I am shocked she is the one who checks people in at this wonderful resort.She had the nerve to tell me that she use to be a smoker and she knew for a fact she never smelled like smoke and nor did her clothes and that we did amoke in our rooms and just argued back and forth with me.When the staff finally seen I was telling the truth I ask the manager for an apology from the young girl with the nasty attitude and she would not make that little girl come out and apologize to me.WOW. I am a 45 yr.old woman and that little girl talked to me like I was 17 and like I said before,I can't believe that is what you have to deal with at this wonderful resort.I promise you that this young,rude little girl will ruin this resort.So be aware when you check in to make sure you have witnessess as far as paying you bill,and everything you do there because this little gir isn't one to listen to the guests.

Reviews.Title: “Run-amok Beach Club”
Reviews.Author: FamilyTripsAreFun
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel for an early Christmas visit with extended family. This was our only time to get together. I had called ahead early in the week to make sure everything was OK with the reservation and that late check in would be allowed. When we all arrived on Friday evening, we were told our 3 bedroom villa had been given to someone else in error and that we were being put up in another hotel across the street. The other hotel gave us two adjoining suites. Unfortunately, they were smoking rooms. The smell was horrible. We tried to get non-smoking rooms but the hotel had nothing available. We went back to the Beach Club and they found two single bedroom villas for us. Both upstairs. No wash cloths. Not very clean. But we were promised that we would have a 3 bedroom the next night. Early the next day, we spoke to the management. We were told that there would be three units available that night. We asked for a ground floor unit since we had some people that had difficulty with stairs. Again we were told no problem; they would check us into the room as soon as it became available. Just to be safe, I called the desk later that day to make sure everything was ready for us when we returned in the evening. I was assured it was. When we got to the Runaway Beach Club that evening to check in to our 3 bedroom villa, I was not given the room I was promised. I was given a 3 bedroom villa on the second floor. Needless to say, I was not happy, but it was late, we were tired and we took the room. When we got to the room, it was dirty. Sheets were dirty. Ceiling fans had dust caked on. The kitchen counters and dining room table were sticky and had food debris. There were hand prints on the walls and cobwebs on the ceiling and lights. So we called the front desk and the night maintenance man came to check things out. He completely agreed that the unit was not properly cleaned. He brought us fresh sheets, blankets, towels, wash cloths and some cleaning supplies. We did some minor cleaning ourselves and made the beds with the fresh sheets. (Please note that on one of the beds, the sheets looked like it had hand prints and either mouse or rat feces.) We threw the dirty sheets in the corner. The next morning, I spoke with a different manager. She handled maintenance. I told her I would not be paying for the room that night since we had to do our own housekeeping and that I expected the unit to be immaculate when we returned for our final night. She assured me it would be. So we enjoyed our final day in Orlando together and went back to our villa after dinner. It wasn't clean. The dirty sheets we had taken off the beds were put right back on (I could tell by the hand prints and the thing that looked like mouse or rat feces.) Cobwebs still there. Ceiling fans still had dust caked on. Bathrooms still had hair on the floor that didn't belong to anyone in our family. This was a disaster. To top it all off, we decided to play some cards at the dining room table. When we attempted to move the table from the wall, on leg started to fall off. It was completely broken and had been placed under the table and the table leaned on the wall for support. On our checkout, I told the person at the counter I would not be paying for any of my stay. I then called my credit card company to make sure that any charges were reversed. So far, I've been refunded all but about $11. I can't understand how Mike Ditka can put his name on this place. It's horrible.

Reviews.Title: “downgrade in progress”
Reviews.Author: tango17b
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this place several times. During this visit we had to learn that they are downgrading in service. No more free morning coffee in the lobby and no more room service at all. Hovever you can have your trash emptied and towels exchanged for $15 a day. Add another $10 if you would like to have your bed made. Basically that was included in your room rate earlier. Just don't be disappointed if you have stayed there before. Location and appearance of the property are still ok. It's conveniently located in the Kissimmee area.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay, bring your own supplies.”
Reviews.Author: Vedastar
Reviews.Content: Loved it! Beautiful place with full kitchen and everything u need to cook, except food & supplies. Great place for the price! Can't wait to go back!

Reviews.Title: “This is a very nice resort and would recommend to people with a family.”
Reviews.Author: DinahJohn
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice resort for people with kids. They have a great pool for kids and then another that adults can relax at. A nice outside bar and patio area with lots of lunge chairs. They also have an indoor basketball court and great work out center. The reception area is nice and the check in is easy and quick. They only thing I would fore warn - you need to bring your own dishwashing, dishwasher and laundrydetergent, papertowels (some resorts have these in the rooms). The rooms are spacious and clean (we were upgraded to a 3 bedroom with loft).

Reviews.Title: “Extended stay in your home away from home”
Reviews.Author: Zowski
Reviews.Content: I had the great pleasure of staying at the Mike Ditka Resort for 6 weeks this summer. My condo was upstairs and featured a very large living room with 2 sofas, a big screen tv, a full kitchen with sink, dishwasher, oven, stove top, full size refrigerator, tons of cupboard storage space, a counter with barstools, and table with 4 chairs. There were 2 bedrooms in my condo, but there are larger condos on the property as well. The master bedroom comes with a king size bed, tv, chair, dresser, walk in closet and full bathroom. The other bedroom comes with 1 full bed and 1 twin bed, tv, dresser, smaller walk in closet. Every room has a ceiling fan to accompany the lovely air conditioning already provided. There is a second bathroom across the hall with a bathtub/shower, toilet and sink. And last but not least, a small laundry area with full size washer and dryer, iron and ironing board. The staff was very friendly and the service was great. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who wants to feel as if they're at home while traveling or for families that need extra space for the little ones, but don't want to be in separate hotel rooms. There is also a large pool area where you can relax and listen to the reggae music that is always playing, and get a drink from the tiki bar by the pool. They have a nice fitness area inside next to the lobby, and indoor basketball area. Everything about this place is great. It's in a beautiful area, very close to Disney theme parks. It's down the street from just about everything- Walmart, Chik-fil-a, Starbucks, Target, Twistee Treat, Outlets (Gap, Old Navy, etc), Old Town. If I had to complain about anything, my only complaint would be that if you need to print something out, I'd recommend purchasing your own printer or finding a kinkos. They have a computer you can use in the lobby, which also has a printer but you have to buy a certain number of minutes to use the computer, and each time you print a page it deducts minutes from your time. But, when you go in there to print something that should take no longer than 5 minutes to do, it ends up taking 30 minutes, and you have to keep paying more money for extra minutes. Not fun. Save yourself some trouble and sanity, and spend your money on a reliable printer instead of getting frustrated with their incredibly slow computer.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, Very clean, Very Pleased”
Reviews.Author: nowhereman55
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a Disney trip last week. We stay At Mike Ditka's Runaway Beach club for 6 days. I seldom write reviews, but had to for the amazing value that this place offered. Everything was clean and the place was spacious. We had proper kitchenware, coffee maker, towels, soap, etc. We will definitely be staying here when we return to Disney again.

Reviews.Title: “RUNAWAY - Run as fast as you can away from here”
Reviews.Author: lksmitt
Reviews.Content: This Resort is NOT a resort. It is run by young and inexperienced people. They have no customer service and no consideration for their guest. The rooms look clean on the surface however they are discusting. They DO not clean the rooms daily and don’t clean them properly when you check out, before new guest arrive. I have stayed here a few times giving it a 2nd even a 3rd chance. However 3 strikes and they are out. Mike Ditka only lends his name to this place he does not own it. IF you get the first floor you will surely hear your upstairs neighbor every step they make. The bathrooms have mold. The couches are stained and the carpet is old. The kitchen is a nice feature however there are no cooking supplies or proper utensils. I warn you DO NOT STAY HERE. You will be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “DON'T STAY HERE”
Reviews.Author: a7l7f
Reviews.Content: After almost 2 years of staying in the Mike Ditka resort and enjoying it. They have changed there policy's and there staff is young and rude, This is no longer a nice resort to stay at it has become A CHEAP MOTEL, They do not offer Cleaning services and upon checking you are luck if they assign you a room that has been cleaned. After being assigned a room that was not cleaned they moved us to one that appeared on the surface to be clean however in the morning when the sun came up, We noticed mold, and cracks in the bath tub, the shower curtain had brown spots. Regardless how many nights you stay if you run out of toilet paper you are required to run to walmart and replenish it yourself. You are required to wash your towels and they will charge you 15.00 if you want to trade for clean ones. I worn you YOU DO NOT WANT TO STAY HERE,

Reviews.Title: “Second stay, will stay again!”
Reviews.Author: Shinerley
Reviews.Content: This is the second time me and my husband have stayed at the Runaway Beach Club. The first time was in 2006 when we booked directly through the resort, and this time we booked it through VRBO.com (Vacation Rentals By Owner). The owner of this unit (1bed/1bath VRBO#306986) was incredibly helpful and accommodating in getting us settled and making sure all was good. The unit is managed by Kissimmee based Magical Memories. We needed the security bar on the door to be replaced when we moved in, as it was broken, and this was seen to in less than an hour after making the call. The unit itself is spotless, has two flat screen LCD's and washer/dryer. The king bed in the bedroom is amazingly comfortable and there is also two queen size sofa beds in the living room (if you don't mind cramming :-)). As with any vacation rental, be prepared to spend a little bit extra for basic groceries and possibly some kitchen essentials you like to use for cooking, such as potato peelers and a garlic press (we always seem to end up buying these!). Besides from the unit, which really makes you feel home away from home, the location of Runaway is prime for Kissimmee. Publix is across the road, a super Wal-Mart a mile away and you are within 10 minutes of several major freeways, including the I-4. The area is gated, and incredibly peaceful and quiet.

Reviews.Title: “General Manager, Tatiana was reasonable and understanding, on a hot night.”
Reviews.Author: tornadoes6455
Reviews.Content: The air conditoner compressor broke on our second night staying at the resort. The management was very understanding, and did everything possible to try to correct the problems. We were moved into another accomadations with a working AC. GM, Tatiane Vanvelzor, went so far as to refund one night of our 3 night stay. The resort itself is beautiful, the rest of the facility is very nice, unfortunately the AC went out at the very worst time of the year, with a heat index above 100, but I guess that could happen anywhere.

Reviews.Title: “Beautifully furnished, spacious luxury condos near Disney for price of discount hotel room.”
Reviews.Author: jvsgooch
Reviews.Content: We hadn't planned on visiting Disney when we went to Florida to visit our grandchildren, and were a little apprehensive upon finding Mike Ditka's Runaway Beach Club condominiums for only $67 a night. Especially since we had made a last minute trip to Orlando previously and were less than satisfied with our accomodations, but the kids really wanted to go, so we decided to take the chance anyway. To say we were pleasantly surprised is truely an understatement. The entire gated complex is well maintained, spotlessly clean and nicely landscaped. We were able to park right outside our beautifully furnished 1 bedroom condominium, which is also far more spacious than we expected. With not just 1, but 2 queen sized sofabeds, along with an extremely comfortable king sized bed for my husband and I. The kitchen is fully furnished as well, with granite countertops, full sized refrigerator, stove, microwave, dishwasher, along with a toaster, blender, and all the pots, pans, plates and utensiles. It's especially nice having our own full sized washer and dryer, right in the unit. The complex also starts you off with laundry and dishwashing detergent, coffee, and some condiments. The bathroom is also nice and spacious with large fluffy towels.. There are 2 outdoor heated pools, one of which is a zero entry for kids, along with a hot tub. We also really enjoyed the resort's nightly pool parties, featuring an outdoor family movie such as "Shrek" and "Shark's Tale" they run from 8-10pm, which we watched while swimming. About the only thing this resort doesn't have is a restaurant, although it does have a poolside bar and grocery store, which we found came in handy. The staff was wonderful, friendly, helpful, all smiles. We were only planning on staying 3 days, but are having such a wonderful time, we decided to stay an extra 3 days, and I'm typing this from the little porch of our condo right now. Wonderful find, highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: “wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: cremilde67
Reviews.Content: we stayed here for a week, and had a great time. The king size bedroom and living room with two pull out sofas were great. The whole place was very clean, the kitchen had nice granite counter tops. The full washer and dryer were great also. The pools were nice and clean!! Just watch out for the $10.00 per day fee for using their pool etc.

Reviews.Title: “Not here!!”
Reviews.Author: Paul-Laurie
Reviews.Content: We didn't even have soap for the bathroom or kitchen. Disgusting! And they didn't have any in the resort-we asked. Told new management took away to save money. Kitchen didn't even have hotpads. No spatula or spoon for pans; no dish towel or washcloths in the whole condo. Took 4 times to book the resort-put on hold each time. Should have been our first clue. Took 30 minutes to check in as the same 2 gals doing all the checkins were also in charge of the phone reservations. Average place. Very frustrating. Have stayed in much much nicer resorts and fully stocked and my safety(soap) came first. Would not recommend at all!!

Reviews.Title: “Run as fast as you can!!!!”
Reviews.Author: travelinglizzy1909
Reviews.Content: We are here through Get Travel for Challenge Sports, Disney Soccer Nationals 3v3 and chose this resort from a couple choices (2 br w/loft). We got a kitchen that was unstocked, no large pot, only 3 spoons, no serving bowl to make salad, etc. When front desk contacted it was pretty much 'too bad"! Second night AC died & after 3 calls to complain someone came out, did something and 2 hours later cooled down. 3rd day after being in sun hours (heat index 102), back ttoroom & no AC, compressor shot, moved to smaller accommodations & no AC again!! Same "too bad"!! Unprofessional staff!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place, will stay again!”
Reviews.Author: aesiovwa
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with my husband and kids on our Disney World trip and it was excellent! I gave it a four star as I feel one of the ladies at the reception desk could do a better job with guests. I highly recommend it if you are looking for a fun, clean place to stay, an added plus is that it is close to Disney world and all the other attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Our Favorite”
Reviews.Author: ljoh712767
Reviews.Content: For the past few years we've spent our Disney trip at Ditka's. Going to Disney World can be super expensive. But we save so much on food and hotel by staying here. We have not found a location in the Disney World area where you can spend so little for such great accommodations. We love great restaurants, but get tired of eating out and like to prepare our own food, at least some of the time. It's exactly like a small, fully furnished apartment, from full kitchen with pots and pans to washer and dryer in your room. The housekeeping is light, so you will have to pick up after yourself. Request a room on the first floor. There are no elevators in the two story buildings and it's a bummer trying to carry luggage up to the second floor. After a long day at Disney who feels like hiking up a flight of stairs?

Reviews.Title: “You Get What You Pay For”
Reviews.Author: Kristen68
Reviews.Content: Have never stayed here before but picked up a super deal online for it. When we got there the room was gorgeous, it was great having a full kitchen with cookware and also a full washer and dryer right inside. The place was clean, no noticeable next room noise carryover, air conditioning worked and was very comfortable and roomy. However some of the amenties stated online were not in effect at all anymore. They had poolside movies which I thought sounded neat but were not provided at all during our stay, as well as no movies for rent at front desk, no daily paper, and housekeeping was intermittent. Housekeeping didn't bother me because I usually clean anyway and we got clean towels about halfway thru stay. The shuttle service was nice to have and they gave 3 times to choose from both AM and PM. Close and easy to drive to all the big theme parks.Grocery store and Wal Mart were right down the street. For what I paid per night it was easy to overlook the little things, thought overall it was a great place for your dollar.

Reviews.Title: “Would never stay there again!”
Reviews.Author: Bublavi2008
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at the resort in 2008, and absolutely loved it. No complaints at all - recommmended it to everyone we knew. Well, this stay was much, much different! What a disappointment! There we so many issues, but here are the highlights - We were there for five nights, and had to call DAILY for clean towels. Housekeeping would come in and remove the dirty towels, and not replace any! We had NO pots, pans, etc in the kitchen. (We did have plates, bowls & cups) Fuses were blowing. The lawn crew was outside of our window at 8:15 in the morning, waking everyone up! My daughter's hair got caught in their wall-mounted hairdryer because the screen that covers the fan was missing (Lots of screamin and crying!) Our "apartment" was consistently at 79 - 80 degrees - very stuffy & hot. When we called the front desk they sent maintenance who quickly said "Oh, there's no insulation in the roof. The upstairs units get hot & there's nothing we can do about it." For the many times we had to call the desk for many things, we did not receive a single apology. I mailed in the comment card along with a letter expressing my disappointment and a request to be contacted, and six weeks later, I have not received a response. VERY, VERY disappointing!!! We will not be staying there again!

Reviews.Title: “Not a bad place to stay”
Reviews.Author: LadyADMIN
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at Runaway Beach Club for a second time the week of June 14th. Our first visit was in December 2007. I had not intention of staying at the resort because of some the reviews I had read. After a mix up with our reservation at another resort, we decided to try this resort. Although there is some room for improvement, the resort is not a bad place to stay. Richard at the front desk helped us out a great deal. Danielle also was very helpful when we decided to extend our stay for two more nights. One of the chairs in the bedroom could have used a good cleaning and the carpet could be laid out better. But overall, our experience was great. Resort fee: They told us when we arrived that there was a fee, so it was not a shock. Also, if you do your research before hand this is plainly stated even if you book a room through a third party. Cleaning: If you want cleaning, the packet you receive when you check in plainly states what you need to do to receive a general cleaning (trash removal, fresh towels). It also clearly states the cost if you want a deep cleaning. We enjoyed ourselves and hope to return again within the next year. The amenities are adequate and if you need something the resort doesn't provide, there is a Wal-Mart right around the corner. Although it is closer to the Disney parks and recreation, we arrived quickly to the Universal Studios area attractions, dining, and shopping. Good place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Ditka's is my family's choice of hotel from now on”
Reviews.Author: pghfamily489
Reviews.Content: Back in January, 2010, my family and I began to put together plans for a 10 day vacation in the Orlando / Daytona Beach area of Florida. Since there were two distinct familiy groups involved, I first researched hotels with 2 adjoining rooms. Based on the per room cost, we found this to be quite expensive for a 10 day stay. Next, I looked at suite/resort offerings and went through the www.tripadvisor.com comments for the best property. Ditka's Runaway Resort consistently displayed with great ratings. When I went to the website to check on availability for the period 6/12 through 6/22, I found the rates to be excellent. I immediately reserved these dates with the resort and counted the days until our vacation would begin. What a pleasant surprise when we got in late from the Orlando airport. The resort's staff and ammenities surpassed our expectations. The 2 bedroom villa we booked was absolutely beautiful! It was very clean and well appointed. The layout worked well with the bedrooms at opposite ends of the villa, and a washer/dryer combo in the middle. The close proximity to the Disney and Universal theme parks, as well as the great restaurants nearby, sealed the deal for us. We are already planning a two week vacation to Floida next year and the booking of a villa at Mike Ditka's Runaway Resorts will be the first contact I make. Thanks to all of the people connected with the resort for making our stay so enjoyable!

Reviews.Title: “This Hotel/Villa is really nice”
Reviews.Author: brianunderwood
Reviews.Content: Its one of the best places that I have stayed in as far as hotels. The check in was quick the apartments are spacious and comforting. You can cook, wash your clothes and watch tv as if you were at home. Its close to all of the attractions and has a nice pool, jacuzzi and everything at a walking distance from your apartment. They also have a nice gym where you can do some basic workouts and its not to far from the pool. They have a little of everything in this hotel its a great getaway from everyone and everything.

Reviews.Title: “STAY VERY FAR AWAY FROM THIS DUMP”
Reviews.Author: suncityalex
Reviews.Content: This resort was the dirtiest place that you can imagine, carpets were disgusting, couch was filthy and could have had bugs. There were three and a half hand lotions in the bathroom and no shampoo’s. People left a dirty diaper outside on the lawn. This place is minus stars. We left a day early due to the very trashy surroundings. For the price there are much better places to stay around the area. STAY AWAY.

Reviews.Title: “Never again at any price!”
Reviews.Author: GeorgiaBoyy21
Reviews.Content: After a long day of traveling we arrived at the resort early in the evening. We were informed that our room was not ready and that it would be an hour or so. Two hours later we were finally checked in. Our room was not at all what we expected. The bathroom was dirty and the fridge was disgusting. We called the front desk and they said they would send someone over. It was the next day before housekeeping arrived. We had several other problems during our stay and at one point in time we asked to speak to the General Manager but, "sorry we don't have one" was the response we received. Also be aware of the daily resort fee. The only bright spot in our stay were the bartenders at the pool bar, they were friendly, knowledgeable about the surrounding area and professional at all times. Overall, we would not return to this location ever again but we would stop back at their pool bar just to have fun with the bartenders.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible- Worst Experience Ever!”
Reviews.Author: dgsolidman
Reviews.Content: Stayed here in 2008 - that was a great experience. So I thought it would be an easy decision to book again for 2010. However, Easy ended up meaning HORRIBLE! Evidently, they have a new General Manager and a new company handling the housecleaning. Awakened at all hours of the night when the staff was entering the garage in our unit. On top of that, we had an (unwelcomed) 8 am wake up call each morning when staff gathered outside our unit chatting each other up. Although the windows were closed, it seemed like they were wide open. I mean come on - the #1 reason to book a room is to get a place to sleep - right? If you can't sleep, what the heck? We stayed 9 days/8 nights; visited the pool 3 times - no clean towels at all. Room was not clean. Kitchen was not properly equipped... I could go on, but what you really need to know is that I complained 3 times during the week. Had to keep complaining because a manager never followed up with me. When I checked out, no manager was available. I contacted the General Manager immediately after returning home and it took them several days to reply, only to say they'd look into it. Over a week and half later, I contacted them again and then, after a few more days, they offered me a 35% discount on 1 night of my stay, and a 35% discount for 1 night on a future stay. Clearly, if you have a problem, don't expect anyone to be around to help you out.

Reviews.Title: “Favourite Home Away From Home”
Reviews.Author: BackstreetsBack
Reviews.Content: This was the first place I stayed at when I went to Florida. I've been to Florida several times now, and this resort has left its impression. Although I have found MANY wonderful hotels/resorts in Florida, nothing compares. The rooms are so beautifully decorated. The colours are soothing, pictures are relaxing, and furniture comfy and equally pleasing to the eyes. The staff at the front desk were very friendly and helpful. What's another word for beautiful? Use that as the adjective for the pool area. The cute pastel coloured houses make you feel like you're at home, and parking is literally steps from the door. The Walmart Superstore is a stone's throw away so you can save money and eat healthy by getting groceries there and preparing it in your full kitchen, which is stocked with enough utensils, cups, plates, etc. to throw a party! There is NOTHING bad I can say about this place. Mike Ditka Runaway Beach Club deserves 5 star status.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place ... poor service”
Reviews.Author: CT_traveler999
Reviews.Content: As other reviewers have said, this was a condominium complex that was converted. The complex is attractive, quiet, and conveniently located. It has two pools, a hot tub, an indoor half-court basketball court, and a mid-sized exercise room. What this facility lacks is a professional service staff. The current staff is probably best described as annoying and disinterested.

Reviews.Title: “Very Dirty, noting worked ... very poor service”
Reviews.Author: indianIndiana
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately this is the 2nd time we've stay here. The only reason we stay a 2nd time is because we were with a group of 50+ Cheer competition. The whole place was very dirty …you don’t even feel clean showering in this place. After our competition we moved to a much better resort. We usually stay in 5 star resorts when we travel. My rating for this place not even a .25 star. What a dump

Reviews.Title: “We Love This Place, it does not disappoint"”
Reviews.Author: MaMaFun
Reviews.Content: This is our second time to stay here. We were so excited to return and it did not disappoint us. We love the extra large condos that easily sleep and accomodate our entire family of 8 and then 9. The close proximity to Disney and everything Kissimmee has to offer can not be beat as far as we are concerned. We were able to use their outdoor gas grill, they supplied the propane, so that we could cook outdoors. The pool area is fantastic for the kids. The weather could have been warmer but that is not anyone's fault but Mother Natures. The overall feeling of the place is just what we need on vacation. The kids are happy to return home after a long day at Disney. The kitchen is well equiped. The use of the washer and dryer right in your unit is a huge plus for a family with kids. We cannot imagine ever staying anywhere when visiting Disneyworld. When thinking of staying in the park, we are just not ready to give up the convenience and spaciousness of "Ditkaworld", the name our family has given the place.

Reviews.Title: “Great accomodations for short or long stay.”
Reviews.Author: badgertravelers
Reviews.Content: My husband, myself, and our adult daughter stayed in a spacious 1 bedroom condo. It was very clean, newly painted, and the kitchen was fully equipped utensils for cooking full meals. The washer and dryer in the unit were a big plus. We would definitely stay again. This is an incredible value for the price.

Reviews.Title: “nothing to write home about”
Reviews.Author: Caroline966
Reviews.Content: The resort is actually condos that were turned into a resort. It's nice to have a kitchen so you don't have to spend as much on food but it was dirty and the walls were very thin.

Reviews.Title: “With some TLC this place could be a gem”
Reviews.Author: bbflwr
Reviews.Content: Although a little hard to find(impossible without a GPS), once we arrived we were pleasantly surprised by the quaint, pastel coloured houses that were to be our home for the next 8 days. We rented the 2 bedroom w/loft and games room for 4 adults, hoping to have lots of space for our vacation and had high expectations because Mike Ditka put his name on the place. The first floor is a small entryway and closet(closet door was broken) big enough for one person followed by a long flight of stairs(especially for the member of our party who recently had knee surgery). Once you reach the top you enter what at first glance is a very pleasant and spacious 2 bedroom apartment with two full baths and a full size washer and dryer. Another set of stairs takes you to the loft/games room which is nothing more than a pull out couch, tv and child size air hockey game(a little disappointing and a space we never used). Everything was tidy, however it was obvious that in addition to spot repairs everywhere, the place had not had a thorough cleaning in a long time. The white overhead fan was grey with black tips from dust and dirt, the couch stained with obvious efforts to spot clean making you wonder what had caused the stains to begin with. The appliances, drawers and cupboards were all very clean but when I dropped a knife on the floor I realized that the cupboard doors had not been washed down for a long while, and the floors had only been quickly mopped where you had easy access. Under the stove, in corners, etc. the tile colour was not distinguishable due to the dirt build up. For some, this level of clean would be acceptable and it was comparable to most 3 star hotels. The main bedroom had a large, comfortable king size bed, and spacious ensuite with walk in closet. The shower curtain liner was torn but it did not affect its use and the pillowcase had what we thought was lipstick on it but after stripping the bed and washing the sheets, we realized it was probably nail polish. The other bedroom had a double bed and a twin. Unfortunately, this was not suitable for our party as the double was too small for two adults and we would have preferred at least a queen size bed, however for a family, it might be perfect for three kids. This room had a full bathroom across the hall. Towels, dishes, pots and cutlery were supplied, however if you are going to stay here, you will need some basic goods in addition to your planned meal items, such as: bathroom tissue, corkscrew, frying spatula, paper towels, dish soap, laundry detergent, kitchen sponge, dish towel, garbage bags, measuring cup, teaspoons, coffee filters, coffee, salt, pepper, water(the water has a horrible sulphur taste). Also, plan to be early risers as there is alot of "fix up" activity going on in the area and the sawing, hammering, etc. begins at 7:30am. The pool area was beautiful with lots of comfortable chairs, loungers and a hot tub. The pool side bar was not open and since it was off season, we had the area to ourselves. At $200.00US per night, we felt that the accommodations were acceptable but we all felt that with a little effort, these units could be so much more. We were told that they just got new management and they are trying to address all the problems. If they do, this could be a great place.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place, bad service”
Reviews.Author: dgindes
Reviews.Content: We booked a stay at this nice condo style hotel complex at the last minute. When we tried to check in, they refused to allow us in until 4:30. My elderly parents had to hang out at restaurants waiting and waiting. The person on the desk was nasty and belligerent. He seemed to resent the fact that we booked on Expedia, and when we inquired about adding a night (which we did not) he told us we would have to pay double what we were paying and could not call Expedia to book again. There was no ice on the premises, we were told to go to 7-11 if we wanted it. No restaurant or facilities except a swimming pool. We were also charged a non-disclosed ten dollar "facilities fee" when we arrived, although we were told we were fully pre-paid. Avoid this place.

Reviews.Title: “Last Time We Will Stay”
Reviews.Author: mmd13233
Reviews.Content: We stayed January 16th for two nights. We have stayed here three times in the past and unfortunately, this will be our last visit. The rooms are large and the price is fairly reasonable, BUT there is just zero customer service going on at this hotel. We had a refrigerator that made a horrible noise every time the compressor turned off and on. The entire kitchen rattled and the noise was so loud that it kept us up at night. I can only imagine what our downstairs neighbors thought. We told the front desk about the problem and were told maintenance would check into it. We left around 8:00 a.m. and returned at 5 p.m. There was no note, no phone message and soon, we found out, nothing had been done to our refrigerator. So my husband called the front desk and was told that they need to order a part and we would just have to move our room. Well, we were leaving the next morning and this was just not convenient so we opted to not move our room. Had we not called to check on the maintenance request, they would never have contacted us. Also, the shower was missing a plastic liner. We requested one, but never received one. So the cloth shower curtain got soaking wet each night. Also, our toilet literally wobbled when you sat down and got up. The walls are very thin and I am sure our downstairs neighbors were not happy each time we walked around. We tried to walk softly, but again, everything is thin around there. There were smudges on the walls. Dents in the walls. Dirty base boards. It really is just not the same as when we first stayed. The first time I checked Trip Advisor about this hotel, I believe it was one of the top 50 resorts in Kissimmee, FL. Now, it’s 100 something. Definitely going down. Additionally, the guest checking out ahead of me had several complaints that I won't detail here. So our experience wasn't isolated.

Reviews.Title: “Check the room before you check in!”
Reviews.Author: love2trvl35
Reviews.Content: We arrived Dec.30th for a 2 night stay. The place looks nice when you drive up but if you plan on staying here take some Febreeze or Oust with you. I opened the door and it smelled awful. And it's not FL..I have stayed at other resorts in the area and they didnt smell like this place. I was told by the front desk that the condos are cleaned between guests but I think all they do is vacuum and change the sheets. Counters were dirty, I even went out and bought stuff to spray the tubs because they didnt look clean. But what did it for me was whe I turned the ceiling fan and dust balls started flying everywhere. I called the front desk and they said housekeeping would be there the next day to take care of it ..hmmm that never happened. I even explained to the lady that my son has asthma. so this is a good place if you have the time to clean it...

Reviews.Title: “The resort is getting tired, be carefull when booking, unflexible Manager”
Reviews.Author: Jegyed
Reviews.Content: The resort is getting tired, I have stayed here before and loved it. Good location. This time our beds were not very comfortable ( getting old). The kitchen was not well equipped, basics were missing and the coffee maker did not work. I reported this to the front desk who did not take care of it. Be careful when booking, they have a 72 hour cancellation policy for each night booked. Because of the beds we decided to move to a nicer hotel, so I wanted to check out a day early, not usually a problem with any reputable hotel. When I went to check out the manager told me that he would not refund my money because they require a three day notice. I had already stayed two days at this point. I told him that I assumed that like most hotels once you check in an early checkout is not penalized. I noticed no special language in my booking with Hotels.com. He countered with " Well I could have sold the room". Having been in the travel business I mentioned that this was mid week, low season and the place was empty. I then asked if he had the authority to make an exception and he refused to answer. After rephrasing the question, pointing out that I was a repeat customer who would base my decision on any type of future visit upon his decision he actually replied "Yes I could change it but I won't." He appeared poised for a fight leading me to believe that this is a common problem for guests. Needless to say I will never book a Ditka anything.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap and just OK”
Reviews.Author: MagillaNYC
Reviews.Content: What I liked: The rooms were nice size. It looks like condos that have been converted into hotels. There is a full kitchen with refrigerator which is nice if you are staying for a while. What I was not impressed with: The thing that really turned us off was the comforter on our bed was stained. It was an obvious stain that you would think the staff would have either cleaned or not put it on the bed. There were also stains on the walls near the stairs that may have been from luggage. The other bad reviews seem to have had a big issue with this and it is a problem. We got the room at a really good price and the lack of attention to detail in the cleaning staff may be how they offer such nice rooms so cheaply. They say on their literature that you can get Disney tickets at the front desk and that there is a shuttle to Disney. That is sort of true. When we asked at the front counter we were directed to the concierge desk at the hotel across the road.

Reviews.Title: “We got More than we expected!”
Reviews.Author: dainos7
Reviews.Content: We booked a 3 night stay on our way down from Wisconsin through Expedia. We reviewed the pictures on my laptop and everything appeared nice. When we arrived and checked in, I thought there must have been an error in the booking. The LOW price we paid was a HUGE value when my family of 7, yes i said 7of us were treated to a large , clean, fully accomadated and spacious townhome suite. I paid more for a double queen motel room than I did for our stay here. And to top it off. Wal-mart was 2 blocks from the front gate. We were able to save money buying food, supplies and Disney tickets there. The kids and I had fun in the clean and well maintained pool area to cool off at night. Then it was back to the suite for a movie on the big HDTV widescreen TV. We had a SUPER time at the resort and can't wait till we can come back. Thanks Mike!_

Reviews.Title: “Great stay and value”
Reviews.Author: marsabez
Reviews.Content: Family of four stayed for two days in a one bedroom apartment. Other than the so-so bed, the place was perfect for us. Everything was very clean and staff was very nice. This is the best value we have found so far in the Disney area and we will be glad to book again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “I don't understand the bad reviews”
Reviews.Author: momof3atl
Reviews.Content: we LOVEd this place. We had a 2 BR. It really was more like a townhome community, than a hotel. I thought the facilities were beautiful and the value was great.

Reviews.Title: “Keep looking!!!”
Reviews.Author: JerLynW
Reviews.Content: Appearance of facility is great. Spacious accomodations. But it ends there! The bathroom was not cleaned well. Both the bathroom tub and kitchen sink were clogged!
